detailsHTML:
• Independently discovered and drove solution to Multibillion dollar company wide bug
  • Pioneered Amazon full-time remote employee program after working in Seattle for one year

  • Independently discovered and solved technical internationalization hurdles that had plagued Amazon for 20 years
  • Orchestrated decoupling of local US client team code bases and deployment processes from remote India based teams
  • Mentored intern on an ambiguous project where he had little experience. Led him to a successful project execution plan and job offer from Amazon
title: Software Development Engineer

detailsHTML:

  • Built web apps using Zend PHP Framework
  • Designed concurrent networking tools using Golang
title: Software Engineer

detailsHTML:

detailsHTML:
